channel.title: Russia on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Russia on FinanClub

item.title: South Africa’s Ramaphosa Is No Peacemaker for Ukraine
item.description: South Africa’s Ramaphosa Attempts to Mediate Ukraine Conflict South African President Cyril Ramaphosa has been trying to mediate a ceasefire between Russia and Ukraine, but he has so far been unsuccessful. Ramaphosa has been criticized for his close ties to Russia, and some have accused him of being too soft on the Kremlin.

item.title: Russia, Iran, Venezuela Confound Oil Output Forecasts
item.description: The International Energy Agency (IEA) has lifted its forecast for Russian, Iranian, and Venezuelan output in 2023 by a combined 1.3 million barrels a day, reaching an annual average of 14.3 million barrels a day, according to a recent article on Bloomberg 1.
